h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 12\. Enter Photo Mode in Alternate Ways
content: It’s hidden in the bottom left corner of your pause screen, but you can enter photo mode with the button that’s listed there. But you don’t have to go into the menu to enter photo mode every time!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '12\. Enter Photo Mode in Alternate Ways'.
The content is as follows:
It’s hidden in the bottom left corner of your pause screen, but you can enter photo mode with the button that’s listed there. But you don’t have to go into the menu to enter photo mode every time!
